rukus.text: Arifu ramu ra. Korera wa meiryona keiten no shirushidearu
Ware wa, Arabia-go no kuruan o kudashita. Osoraku anata gata wa satorudearou
Ware wa kono kuruan o anata ni keiji shi, monogatari no naka no mottomo utsukushi mono o katarou. Anata mo kore made kidzukazu ni ita monodearu

Yusufu ga sono chichi (yaakobu) ni ko itta toki o omoe. `Chichiyo, watashi wa (yume de) 11 no hoshi to taiyo to tsuki o mimashita. Watashi wa, sorera ga (mina) watashi ni, sajida shite iru no o mimashita
Kare wa itta. `Musuko yo, anata no yume o anitachi ni hanashite wa naranai.-Sa mo nai to kare-ra wa anata ni taishite sakubo o ‰ºÅ-Ra mude arou. Hontoni akuma wa ningen ni wa kozen no tekidearu

Kono yo ni omo wa, anata o o erabi ni natte, dekigoto no kaishaku o oshie rare, kare ga izen ni, anata no sosen no iburahimu ya isuhaku ni onmegumi o mattou sa reta yo ni, anata to yaakobu no shison ni sore o mattou shita monodearu. Hontoni anata no omo wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru
